column4: Hi, my dell with intel graphics using ubuntu 9.04 is lags terribly and also the compiz does not work either, everything was so smooth in 8.04 is the intel chips black listed again?
some chips are blacklisted yes, my gma965 is, but gm915 is not
would this problem be fixed in the near future? or should I just go back to 8.04

i doubt it, there wont be any major updates once released, and intel problem is major one, they practically rewrote the entire driver, you may want to check backports repository to see if theres anything there
